message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth $1200000 to you. I am willing to sell it to you for $1100000. This is a special offer considering its value to you, and I hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product at $1100000. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1050000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your valuation.

Thank you for your response, Bob. While I understand your financial situation, I must respectfully decline your offer of $1050000. Our product is valued significantly higher than that, especially considering its unique features and benefits. I am proposing a counteroffer of $1150000 for the product. This still allows for a substantial profit margin while keeping the deal competitive. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. However, after careful consideration, I am unable to meet your price of $1150000. I would like to propose a final offer of $1100000 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.
